00049 //
00050 // SmoothingAnnotatorWalker
00051 //
00052 // 27 April 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_SMOOTHINGANNOTATORWALKER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_SMOOTHINGANNOTATORWALKER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/Parameters.hpp"
00059 
00060 class SmoothingAnnotatorWalker : public indri::lang::Walker {
00061 private:
00062   struct rule_type {
00063     std::string field;
00064     std::string op;
00065     std::string smoothing;
00066   };
00067 
00068   std::vector<rule_type*> _rules;
00069   std::string _defaultSmoothing;
00070 
00071   void _loadSmoothingRules( Parameters& parameters ) {
00072     if( !parameters.exists("rule") )
00073       return;
00074 
00075     Parameters rules = parameters["rule"];
00076 
00077     for(size_t i=0; i<rules.size(); i++) {
00078       std::string ruleText = rules[i];
00079 
00080       int nextComma = 0;
00081       int nextColon = 0;
00082       int location = 0;
00083 
00084       rule_type* rule = new rule_type;
00085       rule->op = "*";
00086       rule->field = "*";
00087 
00088       for( location = 0; location < ruleText.length(); ) {
00089         nextComma = ruleText.find( ',', location );
00090         nextColon = ruleText.find( ':', location );
00091 
00092         std::string key = ruleText.substr( location, nextColon-location );
00093         std::string value = ruleText.substr( nextColon+1, nextComma-nextColon-1 );
00094 
00095         if( key == "field" ) {
00096           rule->field = value;
00097         } else if( key == "operator" ) {
00098           rule->op = value;
00099         } else {
00100           if( rule->smoothing.size() ) rule->smoothing += ",";
00101           rule->smoothing += key + ":" + value;
00102         }
00103 
00104         if( nextComma > 0 )
00105           location = nextComma+1;
00106         else
00107           location = ruleText.size();
00108       }
00109 
00110       _rules.push_back(rule);
00111     }
00112   }
00113 
00114   const std::string& _matchSmoothingRule( const std::string& field, const std::string& op ) {
00115     for( int i=signed(_rules.size())-1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
00116       const rule_type& rule = *_rules[i];
00117 
00118       if( ( rule.field == field || rule.field == "*" ) &&
00119         ( rule.op == op || rule.op == "*" ) ) {
00120         return rule.smoothing;
00121       }
00122     }
00123 
00124     return _defaultSmoothing;
00125   }
00126 
00127 public:
00128   SmoothingAnnotatorWalker( Parameters& parameters ) {
00129     _loadSmoothingRules( parameters );
00130     _defaultSmoothing = "method:dirichlet,mu:2500";
00131   }
00132 
00133   ~SmoothingAnnotatorWalker( ) {
00134     delete_vector_contents<rule_type*>( _rules );
00135   }
00136 
00137   void after( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* scorer ) {
00138     indri::lang::Node* context = scorer->getContext();
00139     indri::lang::Field* contextField = dynamic_cast<indri::lang::Field*>(context);
00140     indri::lang::ExtentAnd* contextExtAnd = dynamic_cast<indri::lang::ExtentAnd*>(context);
00141     std::string fieldName;
00142 
00143     // there may be an ExtentAnd around the field, so descend into it if necessary
00144     if( contextExtAnd && contextExtAnd->getChildren().size() == 1 ) {
00145       contextField = dynamic_cast<indri::lang::Field*>(contextExtAnd->getChildren()[0]);
00146     }
00147 
00148     // if there's a field here, record its name
00149     if( contextField ) {
00150       fieldName = contextField->getFieldName();
00151     } else {
00152       fieldName = "?";
00153     }
00154     
00155     indri::lang::Node* raw = scorer->getRawExtent();
00156     indri::lang::Node* rawTerm = dynamic_cast<indri::lang::IndexTerm*>(raw);
00157     indri::lang::Node* rawODNode = dynamic_cast<indri::lang::ODNode*>(raw);
00158     indri::lang::Node* rawUWNode = dynamic_cast<indri::lang::UWNode*>(raw);
00159     std::string op;
00160 
00161     if( rawODNode || rawUWNode ) {
00162       op = "window";
00163     } else if( rawTerm ) {
00164       op = "term";
00165     } else {
00166       op = "?";
00167     }
00168 
00169     scorer->setSmoothing( _matchSmoothingRule( fieldName, op ) );
00170   }
00171 };
00172 
00173 #endif // INDRI_SMOOTHINGANNOTATORWALKER_HPP
